sqlList.sql: select ROOMID AS HOTELROOMCODE,name_zh AS HOTELROOMNM from fog_t_room t where prop=:HOTELID and ROOMID = :ROOMID

select t.effect_date,t.room_type_code,t.room_type_name,t.room_num,t.status from t_lm_plan t inner join t_lm_b_prop lp on t.hotel_id=lp.prop where t.effect_date=TO_DATE(:CurrtDate,'yyyy/mm/dd') and t.hotel_id=:HotelID and t.room_type_code=:RoomCode and lp.status='active' and lp.online_status='1' and lp.type=0 and (t.room_num = 0 or t.status='0') and TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(t.Gmt_Modified,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_DATE(:CurrtDate,'yyyy/mm/dd')

select t.effect_date,t.room_type_code,t.room_type_name,t.room_num,t.status from t_lm_plan t inner join t_lm_b_prop lp on t.hotel_id=lp.prop where t.effect_date=TO_DATE(:CurrtDate,'yyyy/mm/dd') and t.hotel_id=:HotelID and t.room_type_code=:RoomCode and lp.status='active' and lp.online_status='1' and lp.type=0 and (t.room_num = 0 or t.status='0') and TO_DATE(:StartDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') <= t.Gmt_Modified and t.Gmt_Modified <= TO_DATE(:EndDate,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')
